column4: hey guys - i just installed ubuntu desktop - i am trying to share files across a windows network... can someone help me out a bit ?
Have you installed samba yet?
yes
have you set your samba password?
how?
Failed to find entry for user root.
don't run it as root
Failed to find entry for user root.
you're not logged in as root are you?
did you sudo -s?
what is that sposed to do?
just try opening a new terminal then
i dont think smb is up
type "ps -e | grep smb"
nothing happened
then you're right, its not running
have you restarted since you installed it?
I always do after installing things like that, it makes it easier
try "invoke-rc.d samba start"
ok if you say sonith PM
im back
nope
you here
